job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Ready to revolutionize education through cutting-edge AI technology? We're seeking a visionary Full-Stack Engineer to join our mission of transforming learning experiences. Dive into our suite of groundbreaking products:
     * TeachTap - Where history comes alive through AI-powered, TikTok-style learning
     * TeachTales - Creating magical, personalized storytelling adventures
     *
          + TimeBack - Your students' AI learning companion
     * Athena - Revolutionizing academic outcomes through AI-powered video content

   Imagine working in an environment where AI handles the mundane, leaving you free to tackle the exciting challenges that truly matter. Join a global team of innovators who are reshaping education through technology.

   What you will be doing

   Your journey with us will be filled with exciting challenges:
     * Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
     *
          + ️ Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
     * Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation

   What you will NOT be doing

   We value your time and expertise. You won't be:
     * Wasting time on legacy system maintenance or trivial bug fixes
     * Wrestling with problematic infrastructure or poorly optimized systems
     * Trapped in endless planning meetings or organizational bottlenecks
job_details.full_text:
Full Stack Developer, LearnwithAI (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

Ready to revolutionize education through cutting-edge AI technology? We're seeking a visionary Full-Stack Engineer to join our mission of transforming learning experiences. Dive into our suite of groundbreaking products:
     * TeachTap - Where history comes alive through AI-powered, TikTok-style learning
     * TeachTales - Creating magical, personalized storytelling adventures
     *
          + TimeBack - Your students' AI learning companion
     * Athena - Revolutionizing academic outcomes through AI-powered video content

   Imagine working in an environment where AI handles the mundane, leaving you free to tackle the exciting challenges that truly matter. Join a global team of innovators who are reshaping education through technology.

   What you will be doing

   Your journey with us will be filled with exciting challenges:
     * Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
     *
          + ️ Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
     * Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation

   What you will NOT be doing

   We value your time and expertise. You won't be:
     * Wasting time on legacy system maintenance or trivial bug fixes
     * Wrestling with problematic infrastructure or poorly optimized systems
     * Trapped in endless planning meetings or organizational bottlenecks

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on building web applications and mentions AI technologies in the context of product features rather than core AI/ML development. It lacks specific details on model building, data engineering, or MLOps, leaning more towards traditional full-stack development with AI as a product component.

phrases: Craft elegant, modern web applications using cutting-edge technologies and frameworks
Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building and maintaining software applications, including code quality and best practices, which are core to software development.

phrases: Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing with advanced AWS serverless architectures
job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, building advanced cloud architectures, especially serverless, is a key component of deploying and managing applications, which overlaps with operational aspects.

phrases: Shape our engineering culture through thoughtful code reviews and best practice implementation
soft_skills.justification: Code reviews and implementing best practices require collaboration and communication within the engineering team.

phrases: Pioneer new frontiers in cloud computing
soft_skills.justification: Phrases like 'visionary', 'mission', and 'pioneer' suggest a need for initiative, leadership, and a proactive approach to innovation.
The mention of 'cutting-edge technologies' implies a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new tools and frameworks.
